price: 8. »¿Está (Muhammad) mintiendo sobre Al-lah o ha perdido la razón?». ¡De ningún modo! Y quienes no creen en la otra vida serán castigados y se hallan extraviados, lejos de la verdad.
arabic: أَفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَم بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۗ بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلضَّلَٰلِ ٱلۡبَعِيدِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: aftarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban am bihi jinnatun bali alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati fī al-ʿadhābi wal-ḍalāli al-baʿīdi
